flavorText: Its victims feel only an itchy, wriggling feeling just under their skin. By then, it's far too late.

foreignData.flavorText: Seine Opfer spüren meist nur ein juckendes, zuckendes Gefühl dicht unter der Haut. Doch dann ist es bereits viel zu spät.
foreignData.name: Schlängelnder Ablaicher
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Immer wenn der Schlängelnde Ablaicher einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie des Schlängelnden Ablaichers ist.

foreignData.flavorText: Sus víctimas sólo sienten un cosquilleo bajo la piel. Entonces ya es muy tarde.
foreignData.name: Engendro serpenteante
foreignData.text:
Arrolla.
Siempre que el Engendro serpenteante haga daño de combate a un jugador, pon en juego una ficha que es una copia del Engendro serpenteante.

foreignData.flavorText: Ses victimes éprouvent un grouillement désagréable sous leur peau. Mais il est déjà trop tard.
foreignData.name: Amphybane
foreignData.text:
Piétinement
À chaque fois que l'Amphybane inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, mettez en jeu un jeton qui est une copie de l'Amphybane.

foreignData.flavorText: Le sue vittime sentono solo un fastidioso prurito proprio sotto la pelle. A quel punto, è già troppo tardi.
foreignData.name: Serpifero
foreignData.text:
Travolgere
Ogniqualvolta il Serpifero infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, metti in gioco una pedina che è la copia del Serpifero.

foreignData.flavorText: 犠牲者が感じるのは、皮膚の下に何かが這うような痒みだけだ。 しかし、その時にはすでに手遅れだ。
foreignData.name: 落とし悶え
foreignData.text:
トランプル
落とし悶えがいずれかのプレイヤーに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、落とし悶えのコピーであるトークンを１体場に出す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル

foreignData.flavorText: Suas vítimas sentem apenas uma coceirinha sob a pele. Mas então já é tarde demais.
foreignData.name: Serpentóide
foreignData.text:
Atropelar
Toda vez que Serpentóide causar dano de combate a um jogador, coloque em jogo uma ficha que seja uma cópia de Serpentóide.

foreignData.flavorText: Его жертвы чувствуют только, как под кожей что-то неприятно шевелится. Но тогда уже слишком поздно.
foreignData.name: Плодящийся Червь
foreignData.text:
Пробивной удар
Каждый раз, когда Плодящийся Червь наносит боевые повреждения игроку, положите в игру одну фишку, являющуюся копией Плодящегося Червя.

foreignData.flavorText: 受害者只会感到皮下有阵搔痒、蠕动的感觉。 而那时候早已太迟了。
foreignData.name: 盘蛇灵
foreignData.text:
践踏
每当盘蛇灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将一个衍生物放置进场，此衍生物为盘蛇灵之复制。

name: Spawnwrithe
originalText:
Trample
Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, put a token into play that's a copy of Spawnwrithe.

rulings.text: A token created by a Cemetery Puca that’s copying a Spawnwrithe will be a Spawnwrithe with the Cemetery Puca ability.

As the token is created, it checks the printed values of the Spawnwrithe it’s copying — or, if the Spawnwrithe whose ability triggered was itself a token, the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield — as well as any copy effects that have been applied to it. It won’t copy counters on the Spawnwrithe, nor will it copy other effects that have changed Spawnwrithe’s power, toughness, types, color, or so on. Normally, this means the token will simply be a Spawnwrithe. But if any copy effects have affected that Spawnwrithe, they’re taken into account.

If Spawnwrithe’s ability triggers, then Spawnwrithe becomes a copy of another creature before its ability resolves (due to Mirrorweave, perhaps), the token will be a copy of whatever creature the Spawnwrithe is currently a copy of. At the end of the turn, Spawnwrithe will revert back to what it was, but the token will stay as it is.

If a copy effect such as Mirrorweave causes some other creature to become a copy of Spawnwrithe, then that creature deals combat damage to a player, the token that’s put onto the battlefield is simply a copy of Spawnwrithe.

text:
Trample
Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Spawnwrithe.
